Features
Edges (0 points): Hindrances: Habit; Mean; Vow+ Android Features: Asimov Circuits; Construct; Outsider; Programming; Recharge; Unnatural

Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: -2 Toughness: 7 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6

Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Construct: Ignores wound modifiers, requires Repair to heal
